casebody.data:
STATE
v.
HAGAN 2019-0679 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 24, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

Kennedy and DeWine, JJ., dissent.

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On review of order certifying a conflict. The court determines that a conflict exists. Sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 2017-1703, State v. Dangler, and briefing schedule stayed. Sua sponte, cause consolidated with 2019-0640, State v. Hagan.
